author: Nate Raymond
title: Opioid manufacturers claim Ohio local governments can't sue them
text:
Purdue Pharma LP and other drug manufacturers are urging a federal judge to rule that Ohio counties and cities lack the ability to sue them over their roles in the opioid epidemic as only the stateâ€™s attorney general has that power.
The eight pharmaceutical manufacturers made that argument in a motion filed on Friday in federal court in Cleveland, where hundreds of lawsuits against opioid manufacturers and distributors are consolidated in a multidistrict litigation proceeding.
